message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think it would really benefit you. I'm willing to part with it for $12,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I think $12,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for it. Can you meet me in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth more to me than that. How about we settle at $11,000?
I understand that the product is worth a lot to you, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $10,200 for it. Can you meet me halfway?
